title: Is DDOS'ing back?
body: My whole team just dc'd in unison and was unable to re-establish connection to game. Meanwhile losing enemy aced us and blitzed game. We're in different countries on Comms...., wild!

replies.body:
DDoSing players was never a thing.

LoL uses a central server that does not reveal the addresses of clients to eachother, making it impossible to target people, or even target a specific game session, as the server IPs are shared over a whole datacenter.

Shit happens, sometimes a server is having difficulties, and in most cases it hits random players on both teams.
2 ppl on my team in my last match dc'd and reconnected at same. Was wondering if they were on the same connection but maybe not
I am noticing websites like Yahoo and Reddit occasionally being inaccessible today for the first time ever.... I wonder if it is happening to a lot of sites :O
